name: Rabadon's Deathcap
description: Grant %i:scaleAP% @AP@ bonus Ability Power (including components).

name: Infinity Edge

Grant %i:scaleCrit% @CritChance@% Critical Strike Chance (including components) and %i:scaleCritMult% @BonusCritDamage@% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of %i:scaleCrit% Critical Strike Chance above 100% converts to %i:scaleCritMult% @BonusCritDmgPerCritAbove100@% Critical Strike Damage.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

name: Cavalier Emblem
description:

name: Goldmancer's Staff
description: Grant %i:scaleAP% @AbilityPowerPerGold@ Ability Power per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% @AbilityPowerGoldMax@ gold) and a @OnKillProcChance*100@% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% @OnKillProcGold@ gold on enemy kill.

name: Determined Investor
description: After dying during combat @StackLimit@ times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction, grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator, and %i:goldCoins% @GoldGranted@ gold.

name: Mogul's Mail
description:
Grant %i:scaleArmor% @BaseResistsPerStack@ Armor, %i:scaleMR% @BaseResistsPerStack@ Magic Resist, and %i:scaleHealth% @BaseHealthPerStack@ Health when taking damage, stacking up to @StackCap@ times.

At full stacks, grant %i:goldCoins% @GoldAtFullStacks@ gold.

name: Mogul's Mail
description:
Grant %i:scaleArmor% @BaseResistsPerStack@ Armor, %i:scaleMR% @BaseResistsPerStack@ Magic Resist, and %i:scaleHealth% @BaseHealthPerStack@ Health when taking damage, stacking up to @StackCap@ times.

At full stacks, grant %i:goldCoins% @GoldAtFullStacks@ gold.

name: Gambler's Blade
description:
Grant %i:scaleAS% @AttackSpeedPerGold*100@% bonus Attack Speed per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% @AttackSpeedGoldLimit@ gold).

Each attack has a @ChanceToProc*100@% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% @GoldPerProc@ gold.

name: Needlessly Big Gem
description: Once per combat: If the holder is alive after @ProcTimeInSeconds@ seconds of combat, grant %i:goldCoins% 1 gold per @UnitsPerGold@ living allies, and each living ally deals @BonusDamagePerGold*100@% more damage per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% @GoldLimit@ gold).

name: Draven's Axe
description:
Gain %i:scaleAD% @AttackDamagePerGold@ Attack Damage per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% @AttackDamageGoldLimit@ gold).

Attacks grant @StacksPerAttack@ stack, up to @CashoutStacks@ times. At full stacks, grant %i:goldCoins% @CashoutGold@ gold and @CashoutComponents@ item component(s).

name: Diamond Hands
description: Once per combat: At @HPThreshold1*100@% Health and @HPThreshold2*100@% Health, become invulnerable for @BaseDamageImmunityTime@ seconds and grant %i:goldCoins% @GoldPerImmunityProc@ gold.

description: If the holder is alive after @ProcTimeInSeconds@ seconds of combat, your units deal @BaseDamagePercent*100@% + @BonusDamagePerGold*100@% more damage per gold you have (maximum @GoldLimit@ gold). For every @UnitsPerGold@ units alive when this happens, gain 1 gold.
